name: places/ChIJ64Io6BDn5YkRf-ga_UrKRxY

plusCode.compoundCode: PXFR+88 Tribeca, New York, NY, USA

adrFormatAddress: Desbrosses St, Tribeca, NY 10013, USA

originalText.text: I cannot express enough how lucky we felt to have such an amazing photographer for all of our wedding activities. The photos Amma took are so stunning. Photos are one of the only things from your wedding day that last forever and she really captured our day so beautifully, she is beyond talented. Not only are the photos amazing, Amma is a joy to be around, she had a smile on her face, laughing with us and making us feel comfortable behind the camera, we received endless comments from guests throughout the day on how amazing and kind our photographer was. Amma also went above and beyond with helping us with our day of timeline and played a huge part in our day going smoothly, kindly directing our family and friends so we could get all the photos we had wanted, and we had requested a lot of shots with various people so this was very big. I am grateful to have these gorgeous photos thanks to Amma and her second shooter Misha. They made our day that much more special.

originalText.text: We were absolutely thrilled with our experience with Amma! From the moment we met, her warm and fun personality put us at ease. She has an incredible eye for capturing the most beautiful and candid moments, and her direction during our engagement shoot and our wedding  was beyond helpful! The photos exceeded our expectations, it was so hard to choose our favorites because we truly loved every single one ! Choosing Amma was one of the best decisions we made for our wedding day. We truly can not recommend her enough!!! She is not just a talented photographer but she truly cares about making your memories unforgettable.

text.text: We were absolutely thrilled with our experience with Amma! From the moment we met, her warm and fun personality put us at ease. She has an incredible eye for capturing the most beautiful and candid moments, and her direction during our engagement shoot and our wedding  was beyond helpful! The photos exceeded our expectations, it was so hard to choose our favorites because we truly loved every single one ! Choosing Amma was one of the best decisions we made for our wedding day. We truly can not recommend her enough!!! She is not just a talented photographer but she truly cares about making your memories unforgettable.

originalText.text: Amma was the best choice we made! We got to do an engagement shoot with her in Central Park ~1 year before our wedding, which I highly recommend. She made us feel relaxed and natural, and the pictures came out stunning. The practice was helpful for our wedding in the Catskills in Fall 2022. She is easygoing, fun, and knows how to bring out that perfect shot! I love how the photos come out timeless, and that she works in a mix of candid and posed. My husband loved working with Ruby the  morning of our wedding, she made him feel like a rockstar. She was responsive, and professional, and we highly recommend working with her!

originalText.text: Thank you Amma for the beautiful and mesmerizing pictures from our wedding. Working with her was easy and she made me feel nothing but beautiful and wonderful when taking our wedding pictures. I can’t wait for future events that we hope to work with her again.

text.text: Thank you Amma for the beautiful and mesmerizing pictures from our wedding. Working with her was easy and she made me feel nothing but beautiful and wonderful when taking our wedding pictures. I can’t wait for future events that we hope to work with her again.

originalText.text:
Amma Rhea photo is the one to pick.
Amma and Ruby did an amazing job photographing our beach wedding this summer. Their talent and professionalism captured all the pure joy, laughter, tears and fun we were having throughout the day. If you want wedding photos that give the energy, light, color and movement of the day, that make your wedding pictures feel alive, you want Amma Rhea Photo.

Even our posed photos were bursting with energy and emotion. Amma and Ruby seamlessly managed our extensive list of posed shots, corralling our big family and adapting to changing weather and lighting conditions on the beach with ease. Their use of natural light made the colors pop and everyone look their best. We are so happy with how those photos came out. Our family loved them too! Everyone is ordering prints. The photos they took of us on the beach are so romantic. I didn’t know my husband and I could look that good. We are generally pretty goofy and awkward, but Amma and Ruby somehow made us look amazing!

Amma Rhea really excel at candid photos. I will treasure the photos they got of us dancing with our friends and family forever. For every memorable moment, big and small, they were there, getting the shot. They captured all the details of the event we worked so hard to plan, from the decorations we DIY'd to the raw bar that we were too busy to eat. We can relive that amazing day through the photos. They did a wonderful job creating an inclusive shot list so all our guests, not just a few, were represented in our photos.

The value you get with this team is incredible. We have talked to our friends who spent a lot more on their photos (with other companies) and did not have the wonderful experience we did.

Most of all Amma and Ruby were a joy to work with. They were fun, easy going, very approachable and unobtrusive. All of our guests felt so comfortable with them, asking for specific shots. They made the whole experience fun, and they felt very much a part of the day. Amma and Ruby are fun, friendly and extremely talented. We would definitely work with them again and recommend them to everyone!
